price: (49) [O Muḥammad], inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful,
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
